plot: A young newlywed has a chance encounter with an enigmatic minivan driver with a passion for photography. When the amateur photographer confesses to her a previous love affair with a woman who bears an uncanny resembalance to the newlywed, the young woman falls under the spell of this soft-spoken, unkempt, and seemingly hapless young man.
title: Yue shi
plot_es: A young newlywed has a chance encounter with an enigmatic minivan driver with a passion for photography.
